backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining storage mixins, authorization, and many domain types for schools, staff, payments, packing, notifications, and training.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their responsibilities across routing, modules, UI, and demo mode.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme token definitions for light and dark mode with OKLCH color variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup initializing QueryClient, router, theming, toasts, and wrapping everything in a global error boundary.
frontend/src/components/demo/DemoDataUna: Alert component showing a demo‑mode message when required demo data is missing.
frontend/src/components/demo/DemoPreview: Demo‑mode banner with role switching, reset‑warning display, and navigation/query invalidation logic.
frontend/src/components/error/GlobalErro: Global React error boundary capturing errors, showing user‑friendly messages, and exposing raw technical details with reload options.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout handling demo mode, user profile loading, auth redirects, and rendering navigation/header with user actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/RoleNav.t: Role-based navigation menu component that updates links and active state based on user role and location.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Notification dropdown showing unread items, allowing marking as read, with a simplified demo mode view.
frontend/src/components/schools/SchoolSe: School search and listing panel with filtering, loading states, and role-specific action links.
frontend/src/config/roleNavigation.ts: Defines navigation items for each staff role and provides a helper to retrieve them.
frontend/src/demo/demoDataStore.ts: Manages demo-mode localStorage data for schools and related entities with safe parsing and reset handling.
frontend/src/demo/demoGuards.ts: Demo-mode guards controlling which mutation actions are allowed and providing error/tooltip helpers.
frontend/src/demo/demoProfile.ts: Generates synthetic user profiles for demo mode based on selected staff role.
frontend/src/demo/demoRoutes.ts: Maps staff roles to their demo dashboard routes and provides a helper to fetch them.
frontend/src/demo/demoSession.ts: Manages demo session state in localStorage with validation, error handling, and change events.
frontend/src/demo/useDemoPreview.ts: React hook exposing demo session state and actions using useSyncExternalStore.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend data, switching to demo data when demo mode is active.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and button overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/academic/AcademicPack: Displays all school packing statuses with search and filtering, using packing and school data to render a table view. Shows loading skeletons and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/academic/AcademicQuer: Lists academic queries and allows responding via a dialog with status updates. Loads related school and packing info and submits responses through a mutation.
frontend/src/pages/accounts/AccountsQuer: Provides a read‑only view of all academic queries for the Accounts role with status badges and timestamps. Shows loading skeletons and formatted query details.
frontend/src/pages/accounts/AccountsScho: Lets Accounts users search and browse schools, filtering by name, ID, or city. Each entry links to a school details page.
frontend/src/pages/accounts/SchoolPaymen: Displays school details, packing info, and related queries for a selected school in the Accounts section. Handles loading states and navigation when a school is missing.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSchoolDeta: Displays detailed information for a selected school, including metadata, update history, and sectioned info, with loading and demo-mode handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AuditLogPage.ts: Shows a searchable and filterable table of audit logs with loading, demo-mode, and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/OutstandingAmou: Allows admins to search schools and view or update each school's outstanding amount, with validation and mutation feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StaffManagement: Provides CRUD management for staff profiles, including role assignment, permission repair, and demo restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AcademicDa: Displays counts of open and resolved academic queries with quick navigation to the full queries list.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AccountsDa: Shows total schools and provides a school search interface for accounts‑related workflows.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Aggregates system-wide metrics like school count, outstanding totals, packing statuses, and academic queries, and lists school‑level stats.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/MarketingD: Displays marketing dashboard with school list, outstanding amounts, and packing info, allowing selecting a school for details.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PackingDas: Shows packing dashboard with total schools and quick navigation actions for searching schools.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/TrainingDa: Provides training dashboard with school stats, academic query counts, and a table summarizing school packing and outstanding status.
frontend/src/pages/IndexGatePage.tsx: Gate component that routes users based on demo mode, authentication, and profile state.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements the login page supporting Internet Identity and demo login, handling sessions, redirects, and principal copying. Includes validation, error handling, and role-based navigation.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/MarketingQu: Lists all academic queries with status, timestamps, and optional responses for marketing users.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/MarketingSc: Offers searchable school list for marketing users with navigation to school details and registration.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/SchoolCreat: Form for creating a new school, submitting details and routing based on user role.
frontend/src/pages/packing/PackingDispat: Displays history of dispatched packing orders with school names, counts, themes, and dates.
frontend/src/pages/packing/packingOption: Exports static packing class and theme option arrays for UI selection components.
frontend/src/pages/packing/PackingQuerie: Displays all academic queries for packing staff with status badges and timestamps using a list-all-queries hook.
frontend/src/pages/packing/PackingSchool: Lists all schools with search and selection for managing packing status, showing a table of filtered school data.
frontend/src/pages/packing/SchoolPacking: Provides detailed packing management for a specific school, including status updates and editable theme-based packing rows.
frontend/src/pages/schools/SchoolDetails: Shows school details with an admin-only edit form allowing updates to core school fields.
frontend/src/pages/training/SchoolTraini: Manages training visits and academic queries for a school, with create/edit dialogs and related data displays.
frontend/src/pages/training/TrainingPack: Displays searchable packing status data for all schools, including kit counts, themes, and dispatch status.
frontend/src/pages/training/TrainingQuer: Displays a list of academic training queries with loading skeletons, status badges, and optional responses.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's routing structure, including authenticated routes, dashboards, and demo-mode profile handling.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Provides safe extraction of user-friendly error messages, including handling React minified errors and BigInt issues.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project state and issues, including a known React #185 crash and related feature requirements.
